name: Siala
appearance: Sea-glass eyes, kelp-silk shawl that whispers in the wind, lanternlight tracing old vigil-mark scars along her hands.
character: Compassionate yet immovable when the rites demand; speaks with a tide’s patience.
talents: hears the bones’ ‘heartbeat’ under the Span
pacifies a crowd with a chant
interprets omens from wind and chime
dreams: Prove Orum dreams and limit harvest days
End marrow venting in the city’s heart
Reconcile workers and worship through shared rites
secrets: Guards a scale she believes to be a Heart-Scale beneath the Cathedral
Privately fears her latest dream speaks of chains breaking soon
Once delayed a vigil at a Compact envoy’s plea to avert violence, and hates herself for it
